name: Artichoke Dip with Fresh Spinach
author: sheghost
ingredients: ¼ cup roughly chopped fresh Italian parsley
1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and chopped
½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened and cut into pieces
1 ½ cups shredded Italian cheese blend
1 (6.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained and diced
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Combine onions, shallots, parsley, chives, sage, garlic, ginger, and rosemary leaves in the bowl of a food processor; pulse until blended
Pour olive oil in slowly, with the processor running, until pureed
Transfer pureed mixture to a large bowl
Add   and whisk until fully combined, about 3 minutes
Whisk in cream cheese until smooth with no lumps
Add spinach and artichokes and mix until all ingredients are evenly incorporated
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly, about 45 minutes
